field.name: spacer1
field.label:
Welcome to your Template Configuration!

Hover the Parameter Names to get some help...

field.name: useFlashHeader
field.label: Use IMBA Flash Header?
field.description: Here you can on / off the IMBA Flash Header xD

field.name: showGuildName
field.label: Show Guild Name in Header?
field.description: Here you can on / off the Guild Name in your Header. An Alternate to this Guild Name is that you can edit the .psd file included in the Download. .psds can be opened and edited with Photoshop, Fireworks or Gimp

field.name: GuildName
field.label: Guild Name
field.description: Enter the Name of your Guild, Fansite or Community

field.name: FontSize
field.label: Guild Name Font Size
field.description: Default = 26 Font Size of the Guild Name in Pixel - Just play a bit with this to find out your best setting.

field.name: FontColor
field.label: Guild Name Color
field.description: Default: FF8C00 = Orange | Color of the Guild Name in Hexacode

field.name: CopyrightInfo
field.default: Copyright my World of Warcraft Guild
field.label: CopyrightInfo in the Footer
field.description: Here you can enter a copright description that will be visible in the bottom of the page. - You can also add an image with with html code
